name: Felpersham Riding Club
notes: A local riding club where Usha practices and competes in equestrian events. The club offers lessons, training sessions, and hosts competitive events, fostering a community of horse enthusiasts.

name: Borchester Equine Veterinary Clinic
notes: A well-known veterinary clinic specializing in equine health. The clinic provides regular health check-ups, emergency care, and specialized treatments for horses at Felpersham Riding Club and surrounding areas.

name: Borsetshire Horse Shows
notes: Organizer of major horse shows and equestrian events in the region. They coordinate competitions that range from local club events to higher-level championships, often attended by members of the Felpersham Riding Club.

name: Darrington Saddlery
notes: A retailer providing a wide range of equestrian gear and apparel. They supply everything from saddles and bridles to riding clothes and safety equipment. Known for their quality products and expert advice.

name: Felpersham Farriers
notes: Provides farrier services to the Felpersham Riding Club and other horse owners in the area. They specialize in shoeing sport horses and dealing with hoof health issues.

name: Borsetshire Equestrian Feed and Supply
notes: A key supplier of horse feed, supplements, and general stable supplies in Borsetshire. They cater to the nutritional needs of the horses at Felpersham Riding Club and other local stables.
